name: Constela-Trix
description:
Constela-Trix is a racing game inspired by Scalextric. 

Players can face the AI in quick games or in the  tournament mode  while they build the perfect set up for every single circuit they are presented.

Choose your favaourite ship and equip it whit the  zodiac signs that better suit the circuit you will compete in. 

You can also edit your own circuits and share it whit friends so they can play your own creations.
